attributes.action: Scrap VAT on home security products.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The general public know that crime is on the increase despite what the figures indicate and have to spend a fortune on security products to secure there property from the thieves. The only winners in crime are the criminals who steal your possessions and the government who are collecting taxes and VAT on the purchase of security items.
